item.title: Apache Kafka Streams
item.description: I’m interested in Apache Kafka Streamsand would like share some information on this topic with you. There is a great talk about Stream Processing from Neha Narkhedewho co-authored Apache Kafkaand is currently a co-founder and Head of Engineering of Confluent. There is also a good articleon Apache Kafka Streams with lots of background information.
